operations.description: Count the occurrences of each unique value in a column. Useful functions: `df['column'].value_counts()`
Group rows based on one or more columns (e.g., `player`, `type`, `lose_reason`) to calculate aggregate statistics. This helps identify trends and patterns. Useful functions: `df.groupby()`
Calculate summary statistics (e.g., mean, median, standard deviation, count) for grouped data. This quantifies trends and differences. Useful functions: `df.agg()`
Calculate the correlation between columns. Useful functions: `df.corr()`
Sort the data by one or more columns (e.g., `time`, `rally`, `roundscore_A`) to identify trends and patterns over time or score progression. Useful functions: `df.sort_values()`
Create new columns based on existing data (e.g., rally duration, time between shots, score difference). This generates features for further analysis. Useful functions: `df['new_column'] = ...`
